text: Rituparna Sengupta is an Indian actress and producer who is known for her work in Bengali cinema, Hindi cinema and Bangla cinema. Sengupta made her screen debut opposite Kushal Chakraborty in his Bengali fantasy TV series Shwet Kapot (1989) broadcast on DD Bangla. ==Hindi films== {| class="wikitable" |+Key | style="background:#ffc;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
